message: I'll take 90% and leave you 10%. It's a fair deal, considering I'm the one making the first offer.
Let's split it 60-40. It's a more reasonable offer considering the money will be worth less in the next round.
I'm willing to split it 65-35, but I'm not going to give you 60% this time. Let's be reasonable, the money keeps getting less valuable.
Considering the money's value keeps dropping, I think 55-45 is a fair split at this point. We should settle before it's worth even less.
